review: I love this, BEST thing they could've invented! !
author: K. Kulp

review: As advertised. I am enjoying using it. The high definition pictures that come with it are worth the price.
author: George J. Joustra

review: This little device is the cat's meow for an inexpensive way to convert your dumb TV to a smart TV. Data entry is too hard to do much web surfing but your Netflix movie/show works great. Have not tried Amazon prime but others report it is smooth as silk.
author: Terry D

review: I love this! My tv always had a really slow internet connection and couldn't load apps like Netflix or Hulu. The fire stick makes runs these apps really fast! Haven't had any problems with it!
author: Amanda Sessions

review: This seems to work much better than a Roku stick that I had purchased and had to return because it constantly locked up and had to be reset.
author: Carol Gasper

review: Fairly easy to set-up and it was working nicely for two weeks...then it stopped working for several days and I tried several times to go back through the set-up process. Finally, I was able to re-install the fire stick and it worked once again.
author: Peter A Dall, SR

review: It's great.  Netflix would not work half the time on our LG smart TV bur the stick works great.
author: J. Kincaid Smith
